title: WL Martin Plan 24214
summary: Starter-friendly single-story builder spec with smart space planning and value pricing.
description: Plan 24214 targets first-time buyers and downsizers with a thoughtful 1,750 sqft layout. The ranch design keeps everything on one level while the open concept main area creates a spacious impression. This plan has proven popular with builders focusing on affordability without sacrificing livability or curb appeal.
